text: Évora is a city in Portugal. It is the seat of the Évora District. It has 56,596 people. Evora lies in the centre of Portugal, and is one of the hottest cites of the country, reach more than 30C in the summer. The most famous monument in Evora is the Templo Romano Évora (A Roman temple) and the Capela dos Ossos (a chapel lined with many bones).
